SYSTEM: Ontologies-Methodology.pdf: Página 27
27
Ontology Requirements Specification. Task 4 (II)
 Approaches:
 Top-Down: Complex questions are decomposed in 
simple ones.
 Bottom-Up: Simple questions that are organised to 
form complex ones.
 Middle out: Mix approach between top-down and 
bottom-up.
speaker: SYSTEM
